staffDm.confirmSend: If ye confirm 'tis, any messages ye send here wit'in th' next 48 hours will be sent t' staff wit'out any confirmation.
staffDm.noConfirmWarn: Any messages ye send 'ere wit'in th' next 48 hours will be sent t' staff wit'out any confirmation.
staffDm.confirmation: Are ye sure ye want t' send 'tis message t' staff?
staffDm.resendInfo: If ye still want t' talk t' staff, resend it an' click th' âœ… button t' confirm.

errors.noUser: Ye did nah provide a pirate!
errors.noLang: Ye did nah provide a lingo!
errors.falseUser: That pirate could nah be found!
errors.falseFlag: That flag could nah be found!
errors.falseLang: That lingo could nah be found!
errors.falseRole: That role could nah be found!
errors.falseUUID: Could nah find a pirate wit' that UUID!
errors.noPlayer: That pirate has never sailed on Hypixel!
errors.notVerified: That pirate has nah linked their Hypixel account yet!
errors.noAccess: Ye nah be allowed t' execute 'tis command!
errors.noPermission: Ye nah be allowed t' execute 'tis command on 'tis channel!
errors.apiError: Somethin' went wrong while contactin' th' API!

roles.noLevel: Ye must be at least chat level %%level%% t' receive 'tis role! Ye can check yer current chat level usin' %%command%% in %%channel%%.
roles.successTake: Successfully took th' %%role%% role from ye!

timeLeft: Ye will be able t' use %%command%% again %%timestamp%%.
wrongStringURL: Th' link ye sent be a link t' th' editor an' not th' string itself!
example: Click th' button shown on th' image below t' get th' correct string URL. It should look like 'tis: %%url%%
reminderLang: Do nah forget t' also change yer link t' th' %%format%% format.

tips.ib: Has ye tried th' Inhale Banana lingo? Change yer lingo t' it usin' %%langIb%%!
tips.translators: I need translators! Find out how t' become a bot translator by executin' %%translate%%.
tips.prefix: Does ye wanna have a cool prefix on yer nickname? Execute %%prefix%% in %%bots%% an' follow th' instructions! Available t' all Hypixel translators.
tips.enen: Do nah forget t' change yer string links t' en-en!
tips.xp: Ye get random amounts o' XP every minute when ye be chattin', which will eventually make ye level up.
tips.guide: Did ye know we have a guide on how t' get started wit' Crowdin, available fer all translators? Check it out at %%gettingStarted%%, it be containin' some useful tips!
tips.twitter: Has ye followed our twitter account? Check it out at %%twitter%%!
tips.rulesInfo: %%rules%% an' %%serverInfo%% have all th' info ye need 'bout 'tis server!
tips.fixTranslation: Found a mistake in a translation? Contact a proofreader fer yer lingo or let mateys know in a translation channel.
tips.pinnedInfo: Did ye know most channels have important information pinned? Ye should check it out every time ye visit one!
tips.hypixelStats: Ye can view information 'bout a specific pirate on Hypixel by executin' %%hypixelstats%%!
tips.languageStats: Did ye know ye can view statistics fer any lingo on all o' our projects? Just execute %%languagestats%%!
tips.rolesChange: Did ye recently get new roles on Crowdin or join one o' th' projects we support? Execute %%verify%% t' have yer roles updated!
tips.botTranslated: Did ye know our bot be available in multiple lingos? Try executin' %%langList%% t' see a list o' all th' lingos we currently support and ye may just find yer own!
tips.botUpdates: We post every major update t' th' bot or important news 'bout it on %%botUpdates%%, check it out!
tips.moreTips: We be needin' more tips! Submit 'em usin' %%feedback%%.

pagination.notYours: Ye can nah interact with 'tis menu! Execute %%command%% yerself t' do 'tis.
pagination.timeOut: 'Tis menu has timed out. If ye wish t' use it again, execute %%command%%.
